title: Glen and Karen talk State Machines, Bioelectric Signaling and the Architecture of Everything
description:
Glen and I had an impromptu off the record talk after viewing this video with bioelectric researcher, Michael Levin. https://youtu.be/XheAMrS8Q1c

Our talk was unscripted, unedited and unprepared, but we covered some interesting ground nonetheless.

We had no intention to publish, but decided afterwards to put it out there for others who might be interested.
